'''Radiant Spincrystal 95''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Maidens of Sanctity]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a tree trunk in [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]].
